thread.section_title: Hotel Bonsejour Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: warm, sincere welcome.
thread.title_full: warm, sincere welcome. - Review of Hotel Bonsejour Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gareth G
title: warm, sincere welcome.
text: This was SUCH a lovely little hotel and well walkable to the centre of Paris, yet calm in the evening. Rooms spotless, bathroom as if I were the first guest ever to use facilities. Breakfast prepared and tended by Maman with care. Cake even made by maman! Professional administration by Papa. what a lovely family. Good Luck to their hotel.
